Nodes.text: Excuse me, do you mind if I sit here?
Great! I figured you would be friendly.
By the way, I'm Rover. It feels like I spend all of my days on this train.

Nodes.name: Rover
Nodes.text: I do have to say it never gets old!

Nodes.name: Rover
Nodes.text: Say, it doesn't seem like you have much luggage with you. Where are you visiting?

Nodes.name: Rover
Nodes.text: Moving eh? My apologies. How very embarrassing this is for me. Let me try that again - where might you be moving to?

Nodes.name: Rover
Nodes.text: Ah yes, I know that place! It's very beautiful. Plenty of trees and -

Nodes.name: Rover
Nodes.text: WAIT! There is actually nothing there. As in, there are no houses, no shops, no nothing! Except for one guy.

Nodes.name: Rover
Nodes.text: That one guy happens to be a dear friend of mine and I believe he will lend a helping hand to a fellow animal.

Nodes.name: Rover
Nodes.text: Looks like your stop is coming up. Let me make a quick phone call to let my friend know you are coming.

Nodes.name: Rover
Nodes.text: He will set you up with temporary housing. When you are ready just hop off the train and he will greet you! Nice meeting you.
